pageTitle: Aurora : Graphic UI Mods : World of Warcraft AddOns
textBeforeTable: Optional Files (5) Initial release 1.0 Now uses CUSTOM_CLASS_COLORS rather than RAID_CLASS_COLORS to avoid taint. 1.0.1 Improved profession and companion spellbook display 1.0.2 Fixed silly bug with NYI guild level text 1.0.2a Reskinned StackSplitFrame Fixed an other silly bug with quest/gossip frame colours 1.0.3 Made the gear manager reskinning more efficient. Reskinned ItemTextFrame. Reskinned ItemSocketingFrame. 1.0.4 Cleaned up some code. Reskinned raid reset window on calendar. Reskinned new macro frame. Reskinned colour picker frame. Reskinned friends of friend frame. Reskinned add friend frame. Character frame now uses the new class colours. 1.0.5 Code cleanup Tukui support 1.1 Reupload because something went wrong with the previous one 1.1a Fixed guild display Fixed colour system interfering with other addons 1.1.1 Typo fix in guild frame 1.1.1a
